title: Meulles
text: Meulles () is a former <a href="Communes%20of%20France">commune</a> in the <a href="Calvados%20%28department%29">Calvados</a> <a href="Departments%20of%20France">department</a> in the <a href="Normandy%20%28administrative%20region%29">Normandy</a> <a href="Regions%20of%20France">region</a> in northwestern <a href="France">France</a>. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of <a href="Livarot-Pays-d%27Auge">Livarot-Pays-d'Auge</a>.
